vibesExplanation:
The video 'HIIT Indoor Cycling Workout | 30 Minute Intervals: Fitness Training' is best classified under 'The Warrior Workout' and 'The Endorphin Wave' workout vibes. 'The Warrior Workout' is strongly represented through the use of 'HIIT', 'intervals', 'fat burning', and 'max effort', indicating a highly intense and physically demanding session aimed at pushing participants to their limits. The comments also reinforce this with descriptions of 'hard work' and a 'soul leaving my body' feeling, pointing to an intense, effort-driven experience. These elements justify a high score of 0.9 for 'The Warrior Workout'.

'Endorphin Wave' is also appropriate due to the sustained, feel-good energy mentioned in the comments, where participants report coming back to this workout frequently for its ability to elevate fitness levels and burn calories over time. The steady progression observed by a user juggling increasing workout frequencies further aligns with this vibe, meriting a score of 0.7. Overall confidence is high due to direct mentions of workout patterns, intensity, and user satisfaction, clearly indicative of these vibes.
